channel.title: Project Lore - 317 - PI
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2vx0dus.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][b]Vision[/b] Hello. My name is Alec, but you may call me Tratoral. This is me sharing a dream,a vision, on what could BECOME great. Imagine 2 years ago even when RSPS were simple, clean, fun to play, and social. I hope to bring that imagination to a reality. A classic 317 PI, what's more original than that? You may hate on PI, but Nostalgia is much more important to me than simple, "Ew overused source". I would go with Delta if I didn't want to push my own limits, innovation and learning is what I'm striving to do.[/center]
[center][b]About Me[/b] You may think this section is pointless because this thread is about the server not me. But I will be developing the server so you might as well know who I am. I'm 16, sophmore in high school, I'm American. I have been playing RS on and off for 5 years. RSPS on and off for 4 years. I recently began programming about a year ago on and off also. I have done graphic design for 3 years, with results such as this, [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2eluivp.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/9ia8n5.jpg[/img] along with web developing for 4 years. I'm not the best programmer, I only recently have switched to PI, mainly using delta with some success. I feel like advancing my knowledge of programming along with using a better source than delta. By saying this, I hope you understand that I may not make the biggest changes such as add a whole new boss, but I have a cleaned PI source, so I'm not leaching but instead learning. By time I hope this project can become an amazing product of hard work and inspiration. [/center]
[center][b]Goals[/b][/center] To Create a clean but fun nostalgia experience. Involve community events, with constant updates. Add custom quests with rare rewards. Stable economy based of years of RSPS experience. Unique home that is nice without clutter. Keep items simple, no expansive item list from 614+. Interesting dialogue with every NPC. Competitive PvP arena with strategic choke points and map elements. Revolving donation system. Donations will got to VPS and steam/PSN/XBL code giveaways.
Current Progress(PRE-ALPHA): [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/14x2x4g.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/akwdpv.jpg[/img]
Accomplishments: Fully finished clan chat system(not tested with two people).
[center][b]Listed Jobs[/b][/center] Part-Time Programmer: [i]2/2[/i] Client Side Programmer Specialist: [i]0/1[/i] Hoster: [i]1/1(VPS found)[/i] Video Editor: [i]0/2[/i] Moderator: [i]0/2[/i] Head Admin: [i]0/1[/i]
[center][b]Application Layout[/b][/center] [code]Name: Age: Country & Timezone: Skype: Job: Experience: Why do you want this:[/code]
My Contact Info Skype: alec.morasse Email: alecmor@Live.com Youtube: LikeMyTroll
[center][b]Keep coming back for more updates![/b][/center]

[/quote][quote author=dwarfs222 link=topic=603061.msg4223041#msg4223041 date=1360879114]

Name: Louis
Age: 14
Country & Timezone: England, GMT +0
Skype: louis.rsw
Job: Server sided programmer, can do cache work too and small client work.
Experience: Years of playing servers and months of programming.
Why do you want this: I like nostalgia too.

Denied due to rudeness and narcissistic views.

No, You obviously denied him because of his age.
This kid was honest about his age, he could have say that he was 17…
Anyways, Nice development topic, really neat.

Thanks. I also don’t care about his age. I’m 16, I was 14 once, youngest I would accept is 12. Mainly because that is when maturity begins to set in. Reason why I denied him, is because during our discussion he was very narcissistic which means he thinks he is god of programmers, along with him brutally swearing at me because of my denial.
[/quote]
Good choice! Btw, I’m 12. ^.^[/quote]

Just to let you know, I attempted to retract my application because he didn’t trust me, then he went on to “fire” me, which I don’t see to be possible as I was never employed and retracted my application beforehand, but hey-ho.

Vouch - Good developer

item.title: Project Lore - 317 - PI
item.dc:creator: @Tratoral Tratoral
item.description:
@Tratoral wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]Vision
Hello. My name is Alec, but you may call me Tratoral.
This is me sharing a dream,a vision, on what could BECOME great.
Imagine 2 years ago even when RSPS were simple,
clean, fun to play, and social. I hope to bring that imagination to a reality.
A classic 317 PI, what’s more original than that? You may hate on PI, but
Nostalgia is much more important to me than simple, “Ew overused source”.
I would go with Delta if I didn’t want to push my own limits, innovation and learning
is what I’m striving to do.[/center]

[center]About Me
You may think this section is pointless because this thread is about the server not me.
But I will be developing the server so you might as well know who I am.
I’m 16, sophmore in high school, I’m American. I have been playing RS on and off for 5 years.
RSPS on and off for 4 years. I recently began programming about a year ago on and off also.
I have done graphic design for 3 years, with results such as this,


along with web developing for 4 years. I’m not the best programmer, I only recently have switched to PI, mainly using delta with some success. I feel like advancing my knowledge of programming along with using a better source than delta.
By saying this, I hope you understand that I may not make the biggest changes such as add a whole new boss, but I have a cleaned PI source, so I’m not leaching but instead learning. By time I hope this project can become an amazing product of hard work and inspiration.

[center]Goals[/center]
To Create a clean but fun nostalgia experience.
Involve community events, with constant updates.
Add custom quests with rare rewards.
Stable economy based of years of RSPS experience.
Unique home that is nice without clutter.
Keep items simple, no expansive item list from 614+.
Interesting dialogue with every NPC.
Competitive PvP arena with strategic choke points and map elements.
Revolving donation system. Donations will got to VPS and steam/PSN/XBL code giveaways.
